text: can I use hubl (inside a custom module) to loop trough an external  JSON? anybody?

adriancblack: If you're just templating data onto a page, I've imported handlebars.js and used that within raw tags before. I think the order of operations would process the HubL before importing your JSON anyway, but I could be wrong. Might be able to help more if you post your specific use case.
i already have a custom module built and styled that pulls data from a hubdb table … was looking for a quick way to basically just replace the source
yeah, I might be wrong, but I'm pretty sure that isn't possible. My understanding is the JSON wouldn't be referenced until after the HubL processing is already complete.

Yeah, I'd still go with my original suggestion. If you haven't used handlebars.js before, the syntax is very similar to HubL (which is why you need to put it in raw tags). I would imagine a good bit of your code will be directly reusable.
